int32_t  width,
int32_t  height,
int32_t  pixelSize,
int32_t  stride 
) [static]

Helper function that compresses an image into an ETC1Texture.

Parameters:
inputa native order direct buffer containing the image data
widththe width of the image in pixels
heightthe height of the image in pixels
pixelSizethe size of a pixel in bytes (2 or 3)
stridethe width of a line of the image in bytes
Returns:
the ETC1 texture.

an ETC1Texture read from the input stream.

static bool gaia::core::ETC1Util::isETC1Supported ( ) [static]

Check if ETC1 texture compression is supported by the active OpenGL ES context.

Returns:
true if the active OpenGL ES context supports ETC1 texture compression.
static void gaia::core::ETC1Util::loadTexture ( int32_t  target,
int32_t  level,
int32_t  border,
int32_t  fallbackFormat,
int32_t  fallbackType,
const storage::FileInputStream &  input 
) [static]

Convenience method to load an ETC1 texture whether or not the active OpenGL context supports the ETC1 texture compression format.

Parameters:
targetthe texture target.
levelthe texture level
borderthe border size. Typically 0.
fallbackFormatthe format to use if ETC1 texture compression is not supported. Must be GL_RGB.
fallbackTypethe type to use if ETC1 texture compression is not supported. Can be either GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5, which implies 16-bits-per-pixel, or GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, which implies 24-bits-per-pixel.
inputthe input stream containing an ETC1 texture in PKM format.
static void gaia::core::ETC1Util::loadTexture ( int32_t  target,
int32_t  level,
int32_t  border,
int32_t  fallbackFormat,
int32_t  fallbackType,
const ETC1Texture &  texture 
) [static]

Convenience method to load an ETC1 texture whether or not the active OpenGL context supports the ETC1 texture compression format.

Parameters:
targetthe texture target.
levelthe texture level
borderthe border size. Typically 0.
fallbackFormatthe format to use if ETC1 texture compression is not supported. Must be GL_RGB.
fallbackTypethe type to use if ETC1 texture compression is not supported. Can be either GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5, which implies 16-bits-per-pixel, or GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, which implies 24-bits-per-pixel.
texturethe ETC1 to load.
static void gaia::core::ETC1Util::writeTexture ( const ETC1Texture &  texture,
storage::FileOutputStream *  output 
) [static]

Helper function that writes an ETC1Texture to an output stream formatted as a PKM file.

Parameters:
texturethe input texture.
outputthe stream to write the formatted texture data to.
Exceptions:
IOException
